.animated { -webkit-animation-duration: 1s; animation-duration: 1s; -webkit-animation-fill-mode: both; animation-fill-mode: both; }
.animated.infinite { -webkit-animation-iteration-count: infinite; animation-iteration-count: infinite; }
.animated.hinge { -webkit-animation-duration: 2s; animation-duration: 2s; }
.animated.flipOutX, .animated.flipOutY, .animated.bounceIn, .animated.bounceOut { -webkit-animation-duration: .75s; animation-duration: .75s; }
@-webkit-keyframes bounce { from, 20%, 53%, 80%, to { -webkit-animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.610, 0.355, 1.000); animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.610, 0.355, 1.000); -webkit-transform: translate3d(0,0,0); transform: translate3d(0,0,0); }
40%, 43% { -webkit-animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.755, 0.050, 0.855, 0.060); animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.755, 0.050, 0.855, 0.060); -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, -30px, 0); transform: translate3d(0, -30px, 0); }
70% { -webkit-animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.755, 0.050, 0.855, 0.060); animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.755, 0.050, 0.855, 0.060); -webkit-transform: translate3d(0, -15px, 0); transform: translate3d(0, -15px, 0); }
90% { -webkit-transform: translate3d(0,-4px,0); transform: translate3d(0,-4px,0); } }
@keyframes bounce { from, 20%, 53%, 80%, to { -webkit-animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.610, 0.355, 1.000); animation-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.215, 0.610, 0.355, 1.000); -webkit-transform: translate3d(0,0,0); transform: translate3d(0,0,0); }

.bounce { -webkit-animation-name: bounce; animation-name: bounce; -webkit-transform-origin: center bottom; transform-origin: center bottom; }
@-webkit-keyframes flash { from, 50%, to { opacity: 1; }
25%, 75% { opacity: 0; } }
@keyframes flash { from, 50%, to { opacity: 1; }
25%, 75% { opacity: 0; } }
.flash { -webkit-animation-name: flash; animation-name: flash; }

@-webkit-keyframes pulse { from { -webkit-transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1); transform: scale3d(1, 1, 1); }
50% { -webkit-transform: scale3d(1.05, 1.05, 1.05); transform: scale3d(1.05, 1.05, 1.05); }

}</style><style type="text/css">/************ font family ******************/ @font-face { font-family: 'Lato-Regular'; font-style: normal; src: url('/assets/fonts/Lato/Lato-Regular.ttf') format('truetype') } @font-face { font-family: 'Lato-Bold'; font-style: normal; src: url('/assets/fonts/Lato/Lato-Bold.ttf') format('truetype') } @font-face { font-family: 'Lato-Black'; font-style: normal; src: url('/assets/fonts/Lato/Lato-Black.ttf') format('truetype') } @font-face { font-family: 'Lato-Light'; font-style: normal; src: url('/assets/fonts/Lato/Lato-Light.ttf') format('truetype') } @font-face { font-family: 'Lato-Hairline'; font-style: normal; src: url('/assets/fonts/Lato/Lato-Hairline.ttf') format('truetype') } @font-face { font-family: 'Lato-Italic'; font-style: normal; src: url('/assets/fonts/Lato/Lato-Italic.ttf') format('truetype') } @font-face { font-family: 'Lato-BlackItalic'; font-style: normal; src: url('/assets/fonts/Lato/Lato-BlackItalic.ttf') format('truetype') } @font-face { font-family: 'Lato-BoldItalic'; font-style: normal; src: url('/assets/fonts/Lato/Lato-BoldItalic.ttf') format('truetype') } @font-face { font-family: 'Lato-HairlineItalic'; font-style: normal; src: url('/assets/fonts/Lato/Lato-HairlineItalic.ttf') format('truetype') } @font-face { font-family: 'Lato-LightItalic'; font-style: normal; src: url('/assets/fonts/Lato/Lato-LightItalic.ttf') format('truetype') } @font-face { font-family: 'PlayfairDisplay-Black'; font-style: normal; src: url('/assets/fonts/Playfair_Display/PlayfairDisplay-Black.ttf') format('truetype') } /************* font family ******************/
/*********** common css *************/
html { font-family: 'Lato-Regular'; font-size: 14px; margin: 0; padding: 0; overflow-x:hidden; color: #666666; }
body { font-family: 'Lato-Regular'; font-size: 14px; margin: 0; padding: 0; color: #666666; background-color: #fff; }
::-webkit-scrollbar{ width: 10px; height: 9px; padding-top: 40px; }
::-webkit-scrollbar-track{ border-radius: 10px; } ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{ border-radius:10px; height: 30px; width: 8px; background: rgb(111,111,111); background: #dfe0e8; }
::-webkit-scrollbar-track-piece { height: 30px; width: 30px; }
textarea { resize: none; } .text-left { text-align: left; } .text-right { text-align: right; } .text-center { text-align: center; } h1 { font-family: 'PlayfairDisplay-Black'; font-size: 34px; margin: 0; } h2 { font-family: 'Lato-Bold'; font-size: 18px; margin: 0; } h3 { font-family: 'Lato-Bold'; font-size: 16px; margin: 0; } h4 { font-family: 'Lato-Bold'; font-size: 1em; margin: 0; } h5 { font-family: 'Lato-Bold'; font-size: 0.8em; margin: 0; } p { margin: 0; } p:active { outline: none; } label{ font-size: 14px; color: #a3a3a3; } span{ margin: 0; } .event-loader { position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; z-index: 10; height: 80px; } .asterisk{ color: red; } .validationErrorText { padding-top: 0px; font-size: 12px !important; color: red; line-height: 12px; position: absolute; } .padding0 { padding: 0 }
.main_loader { position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; z-index: 1100; } .logo_loader { position: absolute; top: 35%; left: 35%; z-index: 1100; }
/*======================================== primeng css ======================================*/
/*====================== Input field ====================*/ .ui-inputtext { color: #666666; font-family: 'Lato-Regular'; font-size: 14px; margin: 0; outline: medium none; padding: 0 10px; font-weight: normal; border: 1px solid #dfdfdf; width: 100%; height: 35px; box-sizing: border-box; } .ui-inputtext:focus { border: 1px solid #118ab2; } body .ui-corner-all { border-radius: 0; } ::-webkit-input-placeholder { /* WebKit, Blink, Edge */ color: #cccccc; } :-moz-placeholder { /* Mozilla Firefox 4 to 18 */ color: #cccccc; opacity: 1; } ::-moz-placeholder { /* Mozilla Firefox 19+ */ color: #cccccc; opacity: 1; } :-ms-input-placeholder { /* Internet Explorer 10-11 */ color: #cccccc; } /*======================*/
/*====================== Buttons ====================*/ body .ui-button { /*width: 100%;*/ height: 35px; font-size: 14px; font-family: 'Lato-Regular'; text-transform: uppercase; color:#ffffff; outline: none; } /** blue button **/ body .ui-button.ui-button-blue { color:#ffffff; background: #118ab2; } body .ui-button.ui-button-blue:hover { color:#ffffff; background: #046d90; } body .ui-button.ui-button-blue:active, body .ui-button.ui-button-blue:focus { color:#ffffff; background: #035570; } body .ui-button.ui-button-blue:disabled { background: #a3a3a3; color: white; }
/*==== cancel button ====*/ body .ui-button.ui-button-cancel { background: #fafafa; border: 1px solid #dfdfdf; color: #666666; } body .ui-button.ui-button-cancel:hover { background: #f3f3f3; /*color: white; */ }
/*==== delete button ====*/ body .ui-button.ui-button-delete { background: #ef476f; border: 1px solid #dfdfdf; color: white; } body .ui-button.ui-button-delete:hover { background: #ef476f; color: white; }
/*==== green button ====*/ body .ui-button.ui-button-green{ color:#ffffff; background: #06c594; } body .ui-button.ui-button-red { background: #ef476f; color: white; }
/*========= custom button ===========*/ body .add-staff-save-button .ui-button { color: #ffffff; background: #118ab2; font-size: 12px; padding: 0 10px; } body .add-staff-delete-button .ui-button { color: #ffffff; background: #ef476f; font-size: 12px; padding: 0 10px; } .my_clinic_button_container .ui-button { color: #ffffff; background: #118ab2; height: 20px; font-size: 10px; /* line-height: 14px; */ padding: 0 10px; } .my_clinic_button_container .ui-button .ui-button-text { display: block; line-height: 20px; } /*==========================*/
/*====================== Dropdown ====================*/ .ui-dropdown { display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 100%; zoom: 1; cursor: pointer; padding-right: 0em; border: 1px solid #dfdfdf; height:35px; } .ui-dropdown-panel .ui-dropdown-list{ padding: .4em; border: 0 none; color: #666666; }
.ui-dropdown label.ui-dropdown-label { cursor: pointer; padding-left: 10px; padding-top: 8px; color: #666666; } .ui-dropdown .ui-dropdown-trigger .fa { margin-top: 12px; margin-left: -5px; color: #a3a3a3; } .ui-dropdown-open { border: 1px solid #118ab2; } .ui-dropdown-panel .ui-dropdown-item:hover{ background: #118ab2; color:white; }
body .ui-state-active, body .ui-state-highlight { background: #118ab2; color:white; }
/*=====================*/
/*====================== Autocomplete ====================*/ .ui-autocomplete { width: 100%; zoom: 1; cursor: pointer; box-shadow: none; position: relative; display: inline-block; } /*=====================*/
/*============== checkbox ===================*/ body .ui-chkbox .ui-chkbox-box{ border:1px solid #d9d9d9; } /*================*/
/*============= table ===============*/ body .ui-datatable thead th:first-child { border-left: none; } body .ui-datatable thead tr th { border: 1px solid #dfdfdf; text-align: left; border-left: none; border-right: none; color: #333333; font-family: 'Lato-Bold'; font-size: 16px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 15px; text-transform: capitalize; } body .ui-datatable thead th { background-color: #f3f3f3; } body .ui-datatable tbody tr td { padding: 10px 20px; background: #ffffff; border: none; font-size: 14px; border-bottom: 1px solid #dfdfdf; }
/*=====================*/
/*==================== dialog ======================*/ body .ui-dialog { width: 665px !important; right: 0 !important; top: 40px !important; bottom: 40px; } .add-patient-dialog .ui-dialog{ top: 50px !important; height: 1000px; width:695px !important; right:0px !important; /*left:600px !important;*/ }
.signup-diaglog .ui-dialog { width: 500px !important; right: 0 !important; top: 40px !important; /*bottom: 40px;*/ } body .ui-dialog .ui-dialog-titlebar { display: none; } body .ui-dialog .ui-dialog-content { padding: 0; } .dialog_header { border-bottom: 1px solid #dfdfdf; padding: 18px; background: #fafafa; } .dialog_header p { font-family: 'Lato-Bold'; font-size: 24px; color: #333333; text-transform: capitalize; } .dialog_content { padding: 10px; height: 75vh; overflow-y: auto; } .dialog_buttons { position: absolute; bottom: 15px; width: 100%; } body #add_new_appointments .ui-dialog { width: 665px !important; right: 0 !important; top: 25% !important; bottom: 40px; } body #add_new_appointments .ui-dialog { width: 400px !important; height: 350px !important; } body #add_new_appointment .ui-dialog { width: 600px !important; } body #add_new_appointment .dialog_content { padding: 0; height: 65vh; } .add-patient-popup .ui-dialog .ui-dialog-content{ height:1000px !important; }
.deletePopup .ui-dialog { width: 665px !important; right: 0 !important; top: 40px !important; height: 270px !important; }
.editProcedurePopup .ui-dialog { width: 665px !important; right: 0 !important; top: 40px !important; height: 360px !important; } /*========================*/
/*============ navbar search css =============*/ body #navbar_search .ui-inputtext { height: 34px; border: none; padding: 0 20px; } /*================*/
/*============ navbar dropdown css =============*/ body #navbar_dropdown .ui-dropdown { height: 50px; text-align: center; } /*================*/
/*============ inventory stock and type dropdowm =============*/ body #inventory_stock_dropdown .ui-dropdown { height: 30px; } body #inventory_stock_dropdown .ui-inputtext { height: 30px; border: none; } body #inventory_stock_dropdown .ui-dropdown label.ui-dropdown-label { padding-top: 3px; } body #inventory_stock_dropdown .ui-dropdown .ui-dropdown-trigger .fa { margin-top: 8px; margin-left: -1px; } /*================*/
/*============ inventory search =============*/ body #inventory_search .ui-inputtext { height: 30px; } /*================*/
/*=========== progress bar =============*/ body .ui-progressbar { height: 15px; background-color: #dfdfdf; width: 100%; border-radius: 10px; border: 1px solid #dfdfdf; } body .ui-progressbar .ui-progressbar-value { height: 16px; border-radius: 10px; } body .progress-bar .ui-widget-header { background-color: #06C594; color: #ffffff; font-size: 16px; border: 1px solid #06C594; } /***********progress bar************/
/*========= timepicker ===========*/ .ui-timepicker>div { display: inline-block; margin-left: .5em; min-width: 1.5em; line-height: 1.3; }
.ui-timepicker>div a { display: block; opacity: .7; } .ui-timepicker>.ui-separator a{ visibility: hidden; } .ui-datepicker{ position: absolute; width: 95%; } body .ui-timepicker .ui-widget-header { background-color: none; color: black; font-size: 16px; border: 1px solid none; } /*==================*/
/*MY PROFILE HEDING .heading{ background: #f3f3f3; padding: 10px 20px; border-bottom: 1px solid #dfdfdf; }*/
/*========= schedule ===========*/ #schedule_calendar .fc-toolbar.fc-header-toolbar { margin: 0; padding: 8px 10px 0px; background: #f3f3f3; } #schedule_calendar .fc .fc-button-group>* { /*float: right; */ border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid #dfdfdf; background: white; color: #666666; height: 30px; } body #schedule_calendar .fc .fc-button-group .ui-state-hover { background: #f3f3f3; } body #schedule_calendar .fc .fc-button-group .ui-state-active { background-color: #118ab2; color: white; } #schedule_calendar .fc-toolbar .fc-state-active, .fc-toolbar .ui-state-active { z-index: 0; } #schedule_calendar .fc-toolbar h2 { font-size: 14px; } #schedule_calendar .fc .fc-toolbar>*>* { height: 30px; border-radius: 0; color: #666666; } .fc-scroller { height: 100% !important; } body #schedule_calendar .ui-button.ui-state-hover { background: #ffffff; } body #schedule_calendar .ui-button .ui-icon { color: #666666; } body .ui-widget-header { background: #ffffff; color: #666666; font-size: 14px; font-family: 'Lato-Regular'; font-weight: normal; border: 1px solid #dfdfdf; /*height: 40px;*/ line-height: 40px; } body .ui-widget-header:first-child { border-left: none; } body .ui-widget-content { border: 1px solid #dfdfdf; } /*==================*/
/*========checkbox label==========*/
/*.ui-chkbox .ui-chkbox-label { vertical-align: middle; color:#666666; }*/
.ui-chkbox-label { vertical-align: middle; color:#666666 !important; }
.ui-icon-circle-triangle-e:before { content:">"; }
.ui-icon-circle-triangle-w:before { content: ">"; }
/* .ui-icon-circle-triangle-e:after { content:">"; }*/
/*========checkbox label==========*/
body .ui-widget-content:first-child { border-left: none; } /*==================*/
/*========== radio button css ===========*/ .ui-radiobutton-label { margin-left: 3px; color: #666666; } /*==============*/
/*========== input switch css ===========*/ body .ui-inputswitch { height: 6px; width: 34px !important; overflow: visible; background-color: #f3f3f3; border-radius: 8px !important; border-color: #f3f3f3; } body .ui-inputswitch .ui-inputswitch-handle { top: -8px; background-color: #ffffff; border-radius: 50%; transition: background-color 0.3s; width: 20px !important; height: 20px !important; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2) 0px 1px 3px 0px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.13725) 0px 1px 1px 0px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.11765) 0px 2px 1px -1px; } body .ui-inputswitch.ui-inputswitch-checked .ui-inputswitch-handle { background: #06C594; } /*==============*/
body .ui-widget-header{ height:47px; } body .ui-widget-header:first-child{ border:none; }
/*============ checkbox ==============*/ body .ui-chkbox .ui-chkbox-box.ui-state-active { border-color: #06c594; background-color: #06c594; } .ui-chkbox-label { vertical-align: middle; color: #666666; } /*===============*/
/*=========== radio button =============*/ body .ui-radiobutton .ui-radiobutton-box { border: 1px solid #dfdfdf; transition: box-shadow 0.3s; border-radius: 50%; } body .ui-radiobutton .ui-radiobutton-box.ui-state-active { border-color: #06c594; color: #06c594; border: 1px solid; background-color: transparent; } /*===============*/
/*=============== Growl ================*/ body .ui-growl .ui-growl-item .ui-growl-icon-close:before { content: "x"; color: white; } body .ui-growl { position: fixed; width: 500px; z-index: 1011; } body .ui-growl .ui-growl-message-success { background: #06C594; } body .ui-growl .ui-growl-message-error { background: #ef476f; } body .ui-growl .ui-growl-message-delete { background: #ef476f; } body .ui-growl .ui-growl-message-info { background: #118ab2; } .ui-growl-message { padding: 0; width: 100%; float: center; } body .ui-growl .ui-growl-item .ui-growl-image { background: none; color: #ffffff; padding: 4px; font-size: 50px; } /*===========================*/
/*================== consultation input field ==================*/ body #consultMessageInput .ui-inputtext { color: #666666; font-family: 'Lato-Regular'; font-size: 14px; margin: 0; outline: medium none; padding: 0 10px; font-weight: normal; border: none; width: 80%; height: 42px; box-sizing: border-box; } /*====================*/ body .ui-progressbar .ui-progressbar-label{ color:#666666; font-weight:normal !important; font-size:14px; margin-top:-21px; margin-left: 60px; }
/*========== drop down disabled ===========*/ body .ui-state-disabled{ opacity: 1 !important; background-color:#ebebe4!important; }
.ui-button-icon-only .fa { border-radius: 0px !important; left: 32%; top: 17px; margin-left: -8px; } /*================*/
/*========== calendar ===========*/ body .ui-calendar { position: relative; display: inline-block; width: 100%; } body .ui-datepicker td span, .ui-datepicker td a { display: block; padding: .2em; text-align: right; text-decoration: none; color: #666666; } /*================*/
.deleteModal .ui-dialog { width: 388px !important; right: 0 !important; top: 140px !important; bottom: 40px;
} span .animate{ pointer-events:auto !important; } .filter .ui-dialog{ width: 665px !important; right: 0 !important; top: 40px !important; bottom: inherit !important; }
/*paginator*/ body .ui-paginator .ui-paginator-pages a{ border-radius: 0px !important; color:black; padding:4px 12px; }
body .ui-paginator .ui-paginator-prev:before{ display:none; } body .ui-paginator .ui-paginator-first:before{ display:none; }
body .ui-paginator .ui-paginator-next:before{ display:none; }
body .ui-paginator .ui-paginator-last:before{ display:none; } body .ui-paginator > a span{ display: block; font-size: 16px; /*vertical-align: middle !important;*/ } .ui-paginator{ width: 60%; margin: auto; border: 1px solid #dfdfdf !important; padding: 0px !important; margin-top: 5%; margin-bottom: 5%; } /*body .ui-widget-header{ line-height: 27px; height:35px; }*/ body .ui-paginator .ui-paginator-pages{ padding:0px; } .fa-step-backward:before { color: #666666; content:"First" !important; } .fa-step-forward:before { color: #666666; content:"Last" !important;
} .fa-backward:before { color: #666666; } .fa-forward:before { color: #666666; } body .ui-state-disabled{ background-color:transparent !important; } body .ui-paginator .ui-paginator-pages a.ui-state-active{ color:white; } body .ui-paginator .ui-paginator-first{ height:0.6em; } body .ui-paginator .ui-paginator-prev{ height:0.6em; } body .ui-paginator .ui-paginator-next{ height:0.6em; } body .ui-paginator .ui-paginator-last{ height:0.6em; } /*body .ui-datatable tbody tr:nth-child(n+2){ background:red !important; } .ui-datatable tbody > tr.ui-widget-content.ui-datatable-odd { background-color: red; }*/ body .ui-datatable tbody tr td{ font-size: 15px; } .ui-datatable tbody tr.ui-widget-content:hover { background: #d3edf8; }
/*=======prescription diaglog*/ .prescription-diaglog .ui-dialog { width: 700px !important; right: 0 !important; top: 40px !important; /*bottom: 40px;*/ }

}</style><style type="text/css">/************ font family ******************/ @font-face { font-family: 'Lato-Regular'; font-style: normal; src: url('/assets/fonts/Lato/Lato-Regular.ttf') format('truetype') } @font-face { font-family: 'Lato-Bold'; font-style: normal; src: url('/assets/fonts/Lato/Lato-Bold.ttf') format('truetype') } @font-face { font-family: 'Lato-Black'; font-style: normal; src: url('/assets/fonts/Lato/Lato-Black.ttf') format('truetype') } @font-face { font-family: 'Lato-Light'; font-style: normal; src: url('/assets/fonts/Lato/Lato-Light.ttf') format('truetype') } @font-face { font-family: 'Lato-Hairline'; font-style: normal; src: url('/assets/fonts/Lato/Lato-Hairline.ttf') format('truetype') } @font-face { font-family: 'Lato-Italic'; font-style: normal; src: url('/assets/fonts/Lato/Lato-Italic.ttf') format('truetype') } @font-face { font-family: 'Lato-BlackItalic'; font-style: normal; src: url('/assets/fonts/Lato/Lato-BlackItalic.ttf') format('truetype') } @font-face { font-family: 'Lato-BoldItalic'; font-style: normal; src: url('/assets/fonts/Lato/Lato-BoldItalic.ttf') format('truetype') } @font-face { font-family: 'Lato-HairlineItalic'; font-style: normal; src: url('/assets/fonts/Lato/Lato-HairlineItalic.ttf') format('truetype') } @font-face { font-family: 'Lato-LightItalic'; font-style: normal; src: url('/assets/fonts/Lato/Lato-LightItalic.ttf') format('truetype') } @font-face { font-family: 'PlayfairDisplay-Black'; font-style: normal; src: url('/assets/fonts/Playfair_Display/PlayfairDisplay-Black.ttf') format('truetype') } /************* font family ******************/
/*********** common css *************/
html { font-family: 'Lato-Regular'; font-size: 14px; margin: 0; padding: 0; overflow-x:hidden; color: #666666; }
body { font-family: 'Lato-Regular'; font-size: 14px; margin: 0; padding: 0; color: #666666; background-color: #fff; }
::-webkit-scrollbar{ width: 10px; height: 9px; padding-top: 40px; }
::-webkit-scrollbar-track{ border-radius: 10px; } ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{ border-radius:10px; height: 30px; width: 8px; background: rgb(111,111,111); background: #dfe0e8; }
::-webkit-scrollbar-track-piece { height: 30px; width: 30px; }
textarea { resize: none; } .text-left { text-align: left; } .text-right { text-align: right; } .text-center { text-align: center; } h1 { font-family: 'PlayfairDisplay-Black'; font-size: 34px; margin: 0; } h2 { font-family: 'Lato-Bold'; font-size: 18px; margin: 0; } h3 { font-family: 'Lato-Bold'; font-size: 16px; margin: 0; } h4 { font-family: 'Lato-Bold'; font-size: 1em; margin: 0; } h5 { font-family: 'Lato-Bold'; font-size: 0.8em; margin: 0; } p { margin: 0; } p:active { outline: none; } label{ font-size: 14px; color: #a3a3a3; } span{ margin: 0; } .event-loader { position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; z-index: 10; height: 80px; } .asterisk{ color: red; } .validationErrorText { padding-top: 0px; font-size: 12px !important; color: red; line-height: 12px; position: absolute; } .padding0 { padding: 0 }
.main_loader { position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; z-index: 1100; } .logo_loader { position: absolute; top: 35%; left: 35%; z-index: 1100; }
/*======================================== primeng css ======================================*/
/*====================== Input field ====================*/ .ui-inputtext { color: #666666; font-family: 'Lato-Regular'; font-size: 14px; margin: 0; outline: medium none; padding: 0 10px; font-weight: normal; border: 1px solid #dfdfdf; width: 100%; height: 35px; box-sizing: border-box; } .ui-inputtext:focus { border: 1px solid #118ab2; } body .ui-corner-all { border-radius: 0; } ::-webkit-input-placeholder { /* WebKit, Blink, Edge */ color: #cccccc; } :-moz-placeholder { /* Mozilla Firefox 4 to 18 */ color: #cccccc; opacity: 1; } ::-moz-placeholder { /* Mozilla Firefox 19+ */ color: #cccccc; opacity: 1; } :-ms-input-placeholder { /* Internet Explorer 10-11 */ color: #cccccc; } /*======================*/
/*====================== Buttons ====================*/ body .ui-button { /*width: 100%;*/ height: 35px; font-size: 14px; font-family: 'Lato-Regular'; text-transform: uppercase; color:#ffffff; outline: none; } /** blue button **/ body .ui-button.ui-button-blue { color:#ffffff; background: #118ab2; } body .ui-button.ui-button-blue:hover { color:#ffffff; background: #046d90; } body .ui-button.ui-button-blue:active, body .ui-button.ui-button-blue:focus { color:#ffffff; background: #035570; } body .ui-button.ui-button-blue:disabled { background: #a3a3a3; color: white; }
/*==== cancel button ====*/ body .ui-button.ui-button-cancel { background: #fafafa; border: 1px solid #dfdfdf; color: #666666; } body .ui-button.ui-button-cancel:hover { background: #f3f3f3; /*color: white; */ }
/*==== delete button ====*/ body .ui-button.ui-button-delete { background: #ef476f; border: 1px solid #dfdfdf; color: white; } body .ui-button.ui-button-delete:hover { background: #ef476f; color: white; }
/*==== green button ====*/ body .ui-button.ui-button-green{ color:#ffffff; background: #06c594; } body .ui-button.ui-button-red { background: #ef476f; color: white; }
/*========= custom button ===========*/ body .add-staff-save-button .ui-button { color: #ffffff; background: #118ab2; font-size: 12px; padding: 0 10px; } body .add-staff-delete-button .ui-button { color: #ffffff; background: #ef476f; font-size: 12px; padding: 0 10px; } .my_clinic_button_container .ui-button { color: #ffffff; background: #118ab2; height: 20px; font-size: 10px; /* line-height: 14px; */ padding: 0 10px; } .my_clinic_button_container .ui-button .ui-button-text { display: block; line-height: 20px; } /*==========================*/
/*====================== Dropdown ====================*/ .ui-dropdown { display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 100%; zoom: 1; cursor: pointer; padding-right: 0em; border: 1px solid #dfdfdf; height:35px; } .ui-dropdown-panel .ui-dropdown-list{ padding: .4em; border: 0 none; color: #666666; }
.ui-dropdown label.ui-dropdown-label { cursor: pointer; padding-left: 10px; padding-top: 8px; color: #666666; } .ui-dropdown .ui-dropdown-trigger .fa { margin-top: 12px; margin-left: -5px; color: #a3a3a3; } .ui-dropdown-open { border: 1px solid #118ab2; } .ui-dropdown-panel .ui-dropdown-item:hover{ background: #118ab2; color:white; }
body .ui-state-active, body .ui-state-highlight { background: #118ab2; color:white; }
/*=====================*/
/*====================== Autocomplete ====================*/ .ui-autocomplete { width: 100%; zoom: 1; cursor: pointer; box-shadow: none; position: relative; display: inline-block; } /*=====================*/
/*============== checkbox ===================*/ body .ui-chkbox .ui-chkbox-box{ border:1px solid #d9d9d9; } /*================*/
/*============= table ===============*/ body .ui-datatable thead th:first-child { border-left: none; } body .ui-datatable thead tr th { border: 1px solid #dfdfdf; text-align: left; border-left: none; border-right: none; color: #333333; font-family: 'Lato-Bold'; font-size: 16px; padding: 10px 20px; font-size: 15px; text-transform: capitalize; } body .ui-datatable thead th { background-color: #f3f3f3; } body .ui-datatable tbody tr td { padding: 10px 20px; background: #ffffff; border: none; font-size: 14px; border-bottom: 1px solid #dfdfdf; }
/*=====================*/
/*==================== dialog ======================*/ body .ui-dialog { width: 665px !important; right: 0 !important; top: 40px !important; bottom: 40px; } .add-patient-dialog .ui-dialog{ top: 50px !important; height: 1000px; width:695px !important; right:0px !important; /*left:600px !important;*/ }
.signup-diaglog .ui-dialog { width: 500px !important; right: 0 !important; top: 40px !important; /*bottom: 40px;*/ } body .ui-dialog .ui-dialog-titlebar { display: none; } body .ui-dialog .ui-dialog-content { padding: 0; } .dialog_header { border-bottom: 1px solid #dfdfdf; padding: 18px; background: #fafafa; } .dialog_header p { font-family: 'Lato-Bold'; font-size: 24px; color: #333333; text-transform: capitalize; } .dialog_content { padding: 10px; height: 75vh; overflow-y: auto; } .dialog_buttons { position: absolute; bottom: 15px; width: 100%; } body #add_new_appointments .ui-dialog { width: 665px !important; right: 0 !important; top: 25% !important; bottom: 40px; } body #add_new_appointments .ui-dialog { width: 400px !important; height: 350px !important; } body #add_new_appointment .ui-dialog { width: 600px !important; } body #add_new_appointment .dialog_content { padding: 0; height: 65vh; } .add-patient-popup .ui-dialog .ui-dialog-content{ height:1000px !important; }
.deletePopup .ui-dialog { width: 665px !important; right: 0 !important; top: 40px !important; height: 270px !important; }
.editProcedurePopup .ui-dialog { width: 665px !important; right: 0 !important; top: 40px !important; height: 360px !important; } /*========================*/
/*============ navbar search css =============*/ body #navbar_search .ui-inputtext { height: 34px; border: none; padding: 0 20px; } /*================*/
/*============ navbar dropdown css =============*/ body #navbar_dropdown .ui-dropdown { height: 50px; text-align: center; } /*================*/
/*============ inventory stock and type dropdowm =============*/ body #inventory_stock_dropdown .ui-dropdown { height: 30px; } body #inventory_stock_dropdown .ui-inputtext { height: 30px; border: none; } body #inventory_stock_dropdown .ui-dropdown label.ui-dropdown-label { padding-top: 3px; } body #inventory_stock_dropdown .ui-dropdown .ui-dropdown-trigger .fa { margin-top: 8px; margin-left: -1px; } /*================*/
/*============ inventory search =============*/ body #inventory_search .ui-inputtext { height: 30px; } /*================*/
/*=========== progress bar =============*/ body .ui-progressbar { height: 15px; background-color: #dfdfdf; width: 100%; border-radius: 10px; border: 1px solid #dfdfdf; } body .ui-progressbar .ui-progressbar-value { height: 16px; border-radius: 10px; } body .progress-bar .ui-widget-header { background-color: #06C594; color: #ffffff; font-size: 16px; border: 1px solid #06C594; } /***********progress bar************/
/*========= timepicker ===========*/ .ui-timepicker>div { display: inline-block; margin-left: .5em; min-width: 1.5em; line-height: 1.3; }
.ui-timepicker>div a { display: block; opacity: .7; } .ui-timepicker>.ui-separator a{ visibility: hidden; } .ui-datepicker{ position: absolute; width: 95%; } body .ui-timepicker .ui-widget-header { background-color: none; color: black; font-size: 16px; border: 1px solid none; } /*==================*/
/*MY PROFILE HEDING .heading{ background: #f3f3f3; padding: 10px 20px; border-bottom: 1px solid #dfdfdf; }*/
/*========= schedule ===========*/ #schedule_calendar .fc-toolbar.fc-header-toolbar { margin: 0; padding: 8px 10px 0px; background: #f3f3f3; } #schedule_calendar .fc .fc-button-group>* { /*float: right; */ border-radius: 0; border: 1px solid #dfdfdf; background: white; color: #666666; height: 30px; } body #schedule_calendar .fc .fc-button-group .ui-state-hover { background: #f3f3f3; } body #schedule_calendar .fc .fc-button-group .ui-state-active { background-color: #118ab2; color: white; } #schedule_calendar .fc-toolbar .fc-state-active, .fc-toolbar .ui-state-active { z-index: 0; } #schedule_calendar .fc-toolbar h2 { font-size: 14px; } #schedule_calendar .fc .fc-toolbar>*>* { height: 30px; border-radius: 0; color: #666666; } .fc-scroller { height: 100% !important; } body #schedule_calendar .ui-button.ui-state-hover { background: #ffffff; } body #schedule_calendar .ui-button .ui-icon { color: #666666; } body .ui-widget-header { background: #ffffff; color: #666666; font-size: 14px; font-family: 'Lato-Regular'; font-weight: normal; border: 1px solid #dfdfdf; /*height: 40px;*/ line-height: 40px; } body .ui-widget-header:first-child { border-left: none; } body .ui-widget-content { border: 1px solid #dfdfdf; } /*==================*/
/*========checkbox label==========*/
/*.ui-chkbox .ui-chkbox-label { vertical-align: middle; color:#666666; }*/
.ui-chkbox-label { vertical-align: middle; color:#666666 !important; }
.ui-icon-circle-triangle-e:before { content:">"; }
.ui-icon-circle-triangle-w:before { content: ">"; }
/* .ui-icon-circle-triangle-e:after { content:">"; }*/
/*========checkbox label==========*/
body .ui-widget-content:first-child { border-left: none; } /*==================*/
/*========== radio button css ===========*/ .ui-radiobutton-label { margin-left: 3px; color: #666666; } /*==============*/
/*========== input switch css ===========*/ body .ui-inputswitch { height: 6px; width: 34px !important; overflow: visible; background-color: #f3f3f3; border-radius: 8px !important; border-color: #f3f3f3; } body .ui-inputswitch .ui-inputswitch-handle { top: -8px; background-color: #ffffff; border-radius: 50%; transition: background-color 0.3s; width: 20px !important; height: 20px !important; box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2) 0px 1px 3px 0px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.13725) 0px 1px 1px 0px, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.11765) 0px 2px 1px -1px; } body .ui-inputswitch.ui-inputswitch-checked .ui-inputswitch-handle { background: #06C594; } /*==============*/
body .ui-widget-header{ height:47px; } body .ui-widget-header:first-child{ border:none; }
/*============ checkbox ==============*/ body .ui-chkbox .ui-chkbox-box.ui-state-active { border-color: #06c594; background-color: #06c594; } .ui-chkbox-label { vertical-align: middle; color: #666666; } /*===============*/
/*=========== radio button =============*/ body .ui-radiobutton .ui-radiobutton-box { border: 1px solid #dfdfdf; transition: box-shadow 0.3s; border-radius: 50%; } body .ui-radiobutton .ui-radiobutton-box.ui-state-active { border-color: #06c594; color: #06c594; border: 1px solid; background-color: transparent; } /*===============*/
/*=============== Growl ================*/ body .ui-growl .ui-growl-item .ui-growl-icon-close:before { content: "x"; color: white; } body .ui-growl { position: fixed; width: 500px; z-index: 1011; } body .ui-growl .ui-growl-message-success { background: #06C594; } body .ui-growl .ui-growl-message-error { background: #ef476f; } body .ui-growl .ui-growl-message-delete { background: #ef476f; } body .ui-growl .ui-growl-message-info { background: #118ab2; } .ui-growl-message { padding: 0; width: 100%; float: center; } body .ui-growl .ui-growl-item .ui-growl-image { background: none; color: #ffffff; padding: 4px; font-size: 50px; } /*===========================*/
/*================== consultation input field ==================*/ body #consultMessageInput .ui-inputtext { color: #666666; font-family: 'Lato-Regular'; font-size: 14px; margin: 0; outline: medium none; padding: 0 10px; font-weight: normal; border: none; width: 80%; height: 42px; box-sizing: border-box; } /*====================*/ body .ui-progressbar .ui-progressbar-label{ color:#666666; font-weight:normal !important; font-size:14px; margin-top:-21px; margin-left: 60px; }
/*========== drop down disabled ===========*/ body .ui-state-disabled{ opacity: 1 !important; background-color:#ebebe4!important; }
.ui-button-icon-only .fa { border-radius: 0px !important; left: 32%; top: 17px; margin-left: -8px; } /*================*/
/*========== calendar ===========*/ body .ui-calendar { position: relative; display: inline-block; width: 100%; } body .ui-datepicker td span, .ui-datepicker td a { display: block; padding: .2em; text-align: right; text-decoration: none; color: #666666; } /*================*/
.deleteModal .ui-dialog { width: 388px !important; right: 0 !important; top: 140px !important; bottom: 40px;
} span .animate{ pointer-events:auto !important; } .filter .ui-dialog{ width: 665px !important; right: 0 !important; top: 40px !important; bottom: inherit !important; }
/*paginator*/ body .ui-paginator .ui-paginator-pages a{ border-radius: 0px !important; color:black; padding:4px 12px; }
body .ui-paginator .ui-paginator-prev:before{ display:none; } body .ui-paginator .ui-paginator-first:before{ display:none; }
